question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. man wearing a hat
B. young man wearing glasses on the right
C. None
D. None

options.B: young man wearing glasses on the right

triage_reason: The young man wearing glasses on the right is in the foreground, partially obscuring the view of others, while the man wearing a hat is further back in the scene.
